医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新颖的替代策略有望治疗各种遗传性疾病严重联合免疫缺陷 (SCID) 是一组使人衰弱的原发性免疫缺陷疾病，主要由破坏 T 细胞发育的基因突变引起。 SCID 还会影响 B 细胞和自然杀伤细胞的功能和计数。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231027/Novel-replacement-strategy-holds-promise-for-the-treatment-of-various-genic-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231027/Novel-replacement-strategy-holds-promise-for-the-treatment-of-various-genic-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20631ac7-60b7-4701-9242-bac59cb3a3be Fri, 27 Oct 2023 12:12:10 -0400 Novel replacement strategy holds promise for the treatment of various genetic disorders
减少空气污染可降低全因痴呆和阿尔茨海默病的风险此前的报告已将长期空气污染暴露与阿尔茨海默病相关脑斑块的积累联系起来，但这是第一个积累的证据表明，减少污染，特别是空气中的细颗粒物和燃料燃烧产生的污染物，与降低风险有关全因痴呆症和阿尔茨海默病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231027/Reducing-air-pollution-linked-with-lower-risk-of-all-cause-dementia-and-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231027/Reducing-air-pollution-linked-with-lower-risk-of-all-cause-dementia-and-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=768b23dc-f49e-430b-bdb4-d528062681c9 Fri, 27 Oct 2023 12:07:51 -0400 Reducing air pollution associated with lower risk of all-cause dementia and Alzheimer's disease
患有严重 COVID-19 的斯堪的纳维亚人中长期 COVID 患病率较高卡罗林斯卡学院研究人员参与的一项合作研究绘制了斯堪的纳维亚人感染 SARS-CoV-2 后长达两年的严重身体症状负担的患病率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231027/Long-COVID-prevalence-high-in-Scandinavians-with-severe-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231027/Long-COVID-prevalence-high-in-Scandinavians-with-severe-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79789d02-8b69-4866-8dde-cec80cc69750 Fri, 27 Oct 2023 12:00:34 -0400 Long COVID prevalence high in Scandinavians with severe COVID-19

观看：加州和联邦政府投资于无家可归者的医疗保健KFF 健康新闻高级记者安吉拉·哈特 (Angela Hart) 于 10 月 24 日出现在 Spectrum News 1 的《今日洛杉矶时报》上，讨论她对州和联邦扩大街头医疗所做努力的报道——这是一个不断发展的领域，专注于治疗无家可归者，无论他们身在何处，无论他们身在何处。室内或街道上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231027/Watch-California-and-feds-invest-in-health-care-for-homeless-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231027/Watch-California-and-feds-invest-in-health-care-for-homeless-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5cbabfd6-c953-4cc3-870c-03e884769648 Fri, 27 Oct 2023 10:31:20 -0400 Watch: California and feds invest in health care for homeless people
